description:
I want to see if a person, property or tenure has a cautionary alert against them
         So that I can act with caution when interacting with residents at a property
name: As an internal Hackney user (eg. Housing Officer)

elements.name: AC1 - Viewing Discretion alert details on a persons page

steps.name: A person "8d027289-0f0e-56a2-6473-980544f46b29" has a discretion alert assigned to them
I view the persons profile page
I will be able to view a RED bell next to "Discretion alert"
I click on the accordion element
discretion type "Verbal Abuse" and the description "Tenant was abusive" are displayed

elements.name: AC2 - Viewing Discretion alert details on a property page

steps.name: A property "81385307-ddd2-9699-599c-6aaa94f6f4b7" has a person with a discretion alert assigned to them
I view a property profile page
I will be able to view a RED bell next to "Discretion alert"
I click on the accordion element

result.error_message: CypressError: Timed out retrying after 10050ms: `cy.click()` failed because this element is detached from the DOM. `...` Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them. The previous command that ran was: > `cy.get()` This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command. Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element You typically need to re-query for the element or steps.name: discretion type "Do not visit alone" and the description "No Lone Visits - Tenant has violent tendencies - Tenant is care in the community. 2 or 3 Operatives should attend jointly at all times, no works are to commence until Glen Wallker (Risk & Compliance Officer) confirms floor adhesive is free of asbestos and threat level is no longer there." are displayed

elements.name: AC3 - Viewing Discretion alert details on a tenure page

steps.name: A tenure "ae46a00e-ed68-cc9f-b091-85c452c55a03" has a person "8d027289-0f0e-56a2-6473-980544f46b29" with a discretion alert assigned to them
I view a tenure profile page
I will be able to see the RED caution bell next to the property name
I will be able to see the RED discretion alert next to the person name
